entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Chéticamp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chéticamp 3:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 1.5°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
